page.title: 11ST. GEORGE'S JUNIOR SCHOOL.
page.content: Our shool is situated off Woodfield Road. Children join the school at 7 years old from Woodfield Infants and leave for a secondary school at 11 years old. The staff includes the headmaster, 10 teachers(2 of whom float), 4 dinner supervisors, 6 dinner ladies, 4 cleaners and a secretary. There is 1 hall, used for assemblies, lunch and physical education and 8 classrooms. There are 2 yards and 1 large field to play on. Our day starts at 08.55 a.m. We have lessons until 12.00 p.m., with a break of 15 minutes at 10.30 a.m. Afternoon lessons begin at 01.15 p.m. and we go home at 3.30 p.m. We have a break of 15 minutes at 02.15 p.m. There are clubs at lunch time and after school for running, netball, football,music,chess,and many others.
